pages.text: Fire pit is a heat source, used alongsie with $(l:utensils/wok)wok$() or $(l:utensils/bbq_rack)barbecue rack$() to cook food. $(br2)The strcture may be created in-world or in vanilla crafting table.$(br2)You need to right-click the $(italic)completed structure$() with fuel in order to heat it up. In layman's term, the "temperature" of fire pit is measured in three levels; different fuel
can heat up fire pit to different level; if you find that your fire pit is not hot enough, consider using another fuel.$(br2)(Turn next page ->)

There is a HUD indicator to tell the current "temperature" of fire pit. If there is some food being cooked, each ingredient will be displayed alongside with a pie-chart for its "doneness". A red pie-chart means that it is overcooked.
Fan may be used to temprarily rasie pit temperature, at the cost of more fuel.$(br2)Fan can also blow away items on ground (by either right-clicking or using in vanilla dispenser).
